summary: This document outlines the Terms of Reference for the Regional Reputational Risk Committee of Deutsche Bank AG, established to oversee reputational risk management in the Americas. It details the committee's mission, tasks, and responsibilities, emphasizing governance and coordination on behalf of the Management Board.
keyFacts: The Regional Reputational Risk Committee was established on January 1, 2010.
The committee's terms of reference are being revised by the Group Reputational Risk Committee.
The committee is tasked with overseeing reputational risk management in the Americas region of Deutsche Bank.
The Chairperson has the authority to set up the structure and membership of the committee.
The document is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
